alert.note: Alert for Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 2:49PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Concordia Parish through 330 PM CDT... At 249 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Slocum, or 13 miles southeast of Larto. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Concordia Parish. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
